name: 尼古拉·布尔利亚耶夫 Nikolay Burlyaev
intro: Nikolay Burlyaev was born on August 3, 1946 in Moscow, RSFSR, USSR as Nikolay Petrovich Burlyaev. He is an actor and director, known for Ivanovo detstvo (1962), Andrei Rublev (1966) and Voenno-polevoy roman (1983). He is married to Natalya Bondarchuk. They have one child.
